triples.name: Simplicial complex
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel model using simplicial complexes to represent higher-order interactions in multilayer networks.

triples.name: Multidimensional network
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a multilayer network model combining virtual social networks and physical contact networks.

triples.name: Mathematical modelling of infectious diseases
triples.relevance: The paper applies epidemic modeling techniques to study disease spreading on multilayer simplicial complexes.

triples.name: Social network
triples.relevance: The paper uses social networks as one layer of the multilayer model for information transmission.

triples.name: Markov chain
triples.relevance: The paper uses the microscopic Markov chain approach to derive probability transition equations for epidemic thresholds.

triples.name: Monte Carlo method
triples.relevance: The paper uses Monte Carlo simulations to validate the theoretical analytical results.
